A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So hard for me to give it this rating\, just because I am a huge Star Wars nerd. WHY WAS THE EMOTION NOT THERE?!?! That part where Luke just grabbed the light saber and threw it behind him?! Shaking my head. That should have been a much more moving scene\, like the preview portrayed. Every scene where Luke is seen for the first time in years is just awful. Its like\, oh hey. Almost like they werent even surprised he was there. Where was the emotional music welling up as he was shown for the first time? Come on man. Im no director\, but I think I could have done better. The comedy was funny\, just not enough of the emotional scenes to balance out all the funny parts.
